text:
TransUnion Consumer Interactive | San Luis Obispo, CA | ONSITE

Web Developer III

In search of a Javascript expert with experience in MVC frameworks, Handlebars templating, Sass pre-processor, among others to join our UI team in an Agile Java environment making the transition from SOAP to REST.

For more information: https://transunion.taleo.net/careersection/tuext/jobdetail.f...
